title: The Lost Princess in Winter's Grip
description: Annabeth lives a normal life as a happy girl in a small town. Then one day her life is turned upside down by a Royal pronouncement that she is in fact a Princess! With evil nipping at her heels, Annabeth and Prince Ryan must battle Stone Monsters, Bandits, and the dreaded Ice Witches in order to reclaim her title and dispense True Justice throughout the land. Look for Other Titles in the Lost Princess The Lost Princess and the Shifting Sands (Book 2) The Lost Princess and Destiny's Call (Book 3)
author: Josh Kilen
